hero.title: Translate Autonomy into Economic Outcomes
hero.subtitle: Defend, Extend, and Upend your enterprise operations. Discover how our agentic solutions drive efficiency, optimization, and transformation.

solutionsByFunction.title: Autonomous Engineering
solutionsByFunction.desc: Scale software development with agentic coders and automated migration.

solutionsByFunction.title: Intelligent Operations
solutionsByFunction.desc: Automate complex logistics, supply chain reasoning, and generative BI.

solutionsByFunction.title: Compliance & Risk
solutionsByFunction.desc: Real-time monitoring and automated regulatory reporting.

economicImpact.title: Economic Imperative
economicImpact.subtitle: Transforming cost centers into profit drivers. Our ROI framework highlights tangible business value.
economicImpact.roiFormula: ROI = (Value Generated - Cost of Ownership) / Cost of Ownership
economicImpact.pricingModel: Outcome-Based Pricing: Don't pay for effort; pay for impact.

engineering.title: Autonomous Engineering
engineering.description: Scale software development with agentic coders. Kendra Labs provides a suite of specialized agents that can read, write, and refactor code autonomously, achieving 89% code equivalence in legacy migration tasks.

operations.title: Intelligent Operations
operations.description: Replace static dashboards with real-time analysis. Our Analyst Agents connect directly to your data warehouse to answer complex queries, generate reports, and optimize supply chain logistics without human intervention.

compliance.title: Compliance & Risk
compliance.description: Deploy the 'Fincrime Guardian' to autonomously investigate AML alerts. It constructs knowledge graphs, analyzes transaction patterns, and drafts Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs) for human review, reducing investigation time by 40%.
